name: detectchangedfilestask
description: Set a variable based on changed files in the commit.
author: Mathijs van Gool

inputs.name: monitorPath
inputs.label: Folder with changes
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path that should contain changes in order to set the variable to `true`.

inputs.name: targetVariable
inputs.label: Variable name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The variable name that is set to `true` in case files are changed on the defined path.

inputs.name: alwaysUpdateVariable
inputs.label: Always update variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: Always change the variable name to `true` or `false`. If the option is not checked; the variable will only get the value `true` in case of updated files. This allows having a default value in the build definition variables.
